trans-unit.source: Represents a method that will handle drag-and-drop routed events, for example <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理拖放路由的事件，例如方法<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used with the following attached events.
trans-unit.target: 此委托用于下列附加事件。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName>此委托也用于基元素上的以下路由事件。</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 这些路由的事件转发之前列出的附加的事件，以使它们更容易访问中的常规元素模型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName>附加的事件和基元素路由事件共享其事件数据，并冒泡和隧道的路由事件的版本也共享事件数据。</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: 路由事件过程，这可能会影响该事件的处理的特征。
有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
